tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am greatful to have known Dr.Deepika for my second pregnancy. My second pregnancy was not as easy as the first one. Dr. Deepika played a very critical role in making sure my  baby and I were safe. She is a very down to earth person with great professionalism.  She is very transperant in educating her patients on the issues and cares a lot for her patients. Her calmness in listening to every problem and guiding the patients in the right way with right treatment is just commendable. Most doctors would not really worry about their patients after the delivery. But, Dr. Deepika is one such person who really cares a lot for her patients and she still kept checking on my health post my delivery. I am really thankful to have known her and I really recommend her for new moms to be. Thank you Dr.Deepika for everything!
reply_text: Thank you for your kind review Preethi.

review: I had visited janani clinic during my pregnancy. Dr Deepika guided me throughout my pregnancy    and helped us succeed in our journey. She used to answer all the queries and helped us proceed in the right path. My delivery date had passed and the induction procedure has to be followed. Dr deepika mam tried for normal delivery till the last moment. I really thank God for helping me meet deepika mam due to which my pregnancy path was smooth. thanks a lot deepika mam üôè

review: My daughter had irregular menstruation since 1 year due to which which was also found anaemic. Dr Deepika  was referred by my sister who is also her patient. At the time of consultation, I told the entire history of my daughter. She listened to the entire history patiently and then tried to explain the condition and also treatment. I started with the course of medication, within 2 days I could see the remarkable result in my daughter. She is easily approachable and always available to clarify the patients queries. Thank you
reply_text: Thank you for your kind review.
